io.github.whippetdb.memory.db

Class AlignedVarData

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.whippetdb.memory.basic.DynamicDataIO
      • io.github.whippetdb.memory.db.AlignedVarData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MemArray, MemBuffer, MemDataArray, MemDataBuffer, MemDataIO, MemIO

    public class AlignedVarData
extends DynamicDataIO
implements MemDataBuffer
    Same as VarData but with pages aligned at power of 2. Is a bit faster, but may be very wasteful memory-wise, because actual data page size is 2^n+8, which means that the last 8 bytes will take the whole page in an aligned memspace. So it should be used only with non-aligned memspaces, which is quite limiting.
